channel.title: Spammers on me server!
channel.description:
I have everytime spammers on me server. And people that wanna crash server. How can i stop this?
PLEASE HELP!
im using slipknot v4, i dont kwon what version its but its old... i think...

item.title: Spammers on me server!
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

just turn off your server for a couple of mins and they will hopfully go, if not then just warn ur players that it will be off for 5-10min.
